EmailTemplate.name: SendingDataToManager_csvFile_Email_Template
EmailTemplate.Body:
Dear $!manager Sir/Madam,
This email contains a csv file of yuor sub-ordinate belongs to $!department department data from SailPoint IdentityIQ. The attached file includes the detailed identity data report. If you have any questions or further assistance, do not hesitate to contact the Eshiam IAM Team. to managerObject $!managerObject
Thanks,
EmailTemplate.Subject: Sending Identity Data to their Manager
